story:
Once upon a time, in a faraway land, there lived a young boy named Jacob. Jacob was a kind and curious child who loved exploring the wonders of nature. Each night, Jacob's parents would tuck him into bed and share with him stories of faith and hope.

One evening, as Jacob lay in bed looking up at the stars twinkling in the night sky, he felt a gentle presence surround him. It was the presence of God, who had come to visit him in his dreams. God spoke to Jacob in a soft and reassuring voice, saying, "My child, do not be afraid, for I am always with you. Trust in me, and know that I will guide and protect you on your journey through life."

With those comforting words, Jacob drifted off to sleep, feeling a deep sense of peace and love in his heart. In his dreams, he found himself in a beautiful garden filled with colorful flowers and singing birds. As he explored the garden, he encountered various animals who were all living in harmony with one another.

At the center of the garden stood a majestic tree with branches reaching up towards the heavens. Jacob approached the tree and heard a soothing voice coming from its leaves. It was the voice of Jesus, who welcomed him with open arms and said, "Come, my child, and rest in my love. I am the true Vine, and you are my branches. Abide in me, and you will bear much fruit."

Jacob felt a sense of joy and peace wash over him as he embraced the words of Jesus. He knew that no matter what challenges or trials he may face, he could always turn to God for strength and guidance. With a heart full of faith and love, Jacob drifted back to sleep, knowing that he was never alone.

And so, dear child, remember that just like Jacob, you are always surrounded by the loving presence of God. Trust in him, have faith in his wisdom, and know that you are truly cherished and protected. Goodnight, sweet dreams, and may God's light shine upon you always. Amen.
